Glances over his shoulder before approaching the taxi but fails to detect the danger behind him, resulting in being violently pulled into a storm drain.

Thanks the cop politely and drives off quickly through a red light to escape, showing quick decision-making and confidence under pressure.

Complies with police orders by putting up his hands without resistance.
Mocks Gaston's expectation of the drug working immediately ('Ha. Some wonder drug...'), showing a sarcastic and somewhat dismissive attitude.
Remains calm and observant during a tense standoff, quickly assesses the situation as Gaston's 'wonder drug' fails to work.

Looks at Serafine, shocked and confused when she looks back angry and sad.

Comments to Gaston that Claude lied, indicating some critical thinking and observation of the situation.

Shakes his head in disbelief at the werewolf situation, showing awareness and skepticism.

Shoos the onlookers away from Serafine to give her privacy and care for her.
Brushes away Serafine's hair and checks her pulse, showing concern for her well-being.
Accuses Serafine angrily and with horror upon discovering her scar, implying betrayal.

Checks Serafine's pulse and notices the makeup smudge revealing a scar, correctly identifying it as the wound he inflicted on the werewolf that bit him.
Quickly connects the scar to Serafine's possible betrayal, showing insight and awareness of the situation.

Expresses confusion and disbelief but remains engaged with Serafine's distress.

Softens and admits he couldn't kill Serafine, showing emotional intelligence and self-control.
Takes Serafine's hand and guides the knife away from her chest, calming the situation.

Snatches a pistol from the leader who groggily pulls it and aims at him.
Uses the gun to break the chain on Serafine's handcuffs and has his own chain broken in return.

Looks away from grisly scene, disturbed but admits to feeling hungry, showing human vulnerability.
Plans to claim association with the monster to gain access, showing pragmatic but not necessarily warm behavior.

Expresses awe and appreciation for the necropolis despite the grim setting.

Considers Serafine's plan to split up and cut off the enemy, agrees cautiously and reminds to be careful.

Shows anguish and tenderness while cradling wounded Serafine.

Refuses to kill himself despite intense pressure and fear, showing some mental resilience.
